pages.text: When you start to run out of unique ship ideas..

Tyrant is a medieval ship powered by a large dual water wheel and 18 oars. It carries 8 cannons and a massive trebuchet capable of launching several heavy projectiles towards the enemy. Tyrant requires a crew of at least 32 to run at full capacity.
pages.title: Description

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/active/mortar)$(l)Trebuchet/$$(br)Tyrant's trebuchet a launces crude leather sack filled with cannonballs. It rips open mid-air, spreading the cannonballs and $(l)damaging 6 tiles/$ in a $(l)4 by 4/$ area. This ability has $(l)2 Uses/$ and costs $(l)9 Energy/$ to use.
pages.title: Active Ability

pages.text: $(l:naval_warfare:abilities/passive/counterfire)$(l)Tit-for-tat/$$(br)Tyrant refuses to lose a single battle. $(l)Upon being hit/$, tyrant will immediatly fire its cannons, $(l)damaging 3 random opponent tiles/$.
pages.title: Passive Ability
